text: Knema linguiformis is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Borneo. ==References== * de Wilde, W.J.J.O. 1998. Knema linguiformis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Knema linguiformis
